schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1860a), [b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1860b)) Bunk houses showing use made of double roofs, wide screened porches and trellised vegetation for coolness. Note hot water tank on roof. ([c](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1860c)) The "cool room" for sleeping. Has double roof, electric fan and ventilators, sheet iron siding covered with burlap which is continually wetted with a water spray.
schema:name: Farm Dwellings, M.H. Whittier Date Gardens, Indio, Cal. (b)
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
